backend/main.mo: Actor storing contact form submissions in a list with functions to submit a form and retrieve recent entries.
feature_evidence.json: Report file mapping implemented features to related source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of all frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining color tokens, CSS variables, and light/dark mode theme values.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file loading the root container and mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for all site pages using SiteLayout as the root component.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer component with branding, navigation links, contact info, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive header with logo, desktop navigation, and mobile menu using Sheet components.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Layout component rendering header, page content via Outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/content/newsEventsSeed.ts: Static seed dataset defining news and event items with metadata and full content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides a React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Defines an Internet Identity context and provider that manages authentication state, login flow, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS layers and defines custom light and dark theme CSS variables for colors and UI styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it in React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with school history, mission, values, and styled informational sections.
frontend/src/pages/AcademicsPage.tsx: Displays academic programs, grade levels, subjects, and extracurricular offerings in a styled layout.
frontend/src/pages/AdmissionsPage.tsx: Shows admissions steps, requirements, and FAQs with cards, accordions, and structured content.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation and backend submission plus a sidebar showing school contact info.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero section, highlights grid, and a preview of recent news/events.
frontend/src/pages/NewsEventsPage.tsx: Displays filterable news and events using expandable cards sourced from static seed data.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins.
